LanguageData.LargeRockets.label: large rockets
LanguageData.LargeRockets.description: Allows you to build doomsday rocket launchers and triple rocket launchers, one-shot assault weapons that pack a massive punch.
LanguageData.CE_AdvancedFirearms.label: advanced firearms
LanguageData.CE_AdvancedFirearms.description: Allows production of more advanced firearms.
